about_the_game:
To pay off your uncle's debts, you took over his tavern. With the help of your friends, you began to recruit employees, decorate pubs, purchase ingredients, and develop dishes...
Finally, the "Witches Tavern" is on the right track of stable operation.
However, under the appearance of prosperity, this city does not seem to be very peaceful. Your tavern seems to be involved in a great event...



Vinexia’s warm waters are home to vast variety of fish. Ever wondered what kind of yummy dishes they can make?
That's right! Even the witches love fishing!
Pick your favorite spot and bring your custom hooks and fishing rods. It’s time for the big catch!



Wandering around Vinexia after work, you stumbled across a bookstore called "Tide Books".
Interestingly, the entrance only opens when the tide is rising or falling. Volumes and volumes of precious magic books are put on shelves in this mysterious bookstore lit by faint glimmer of violets.
And the owner of the bookstore is…a black cat?
"Oi human! Are my twinkling collections to your liking?"



Fire ball! Thunder Strike! I shall summon our supreme creator!
Wait a minute, does magic have to be all splashy and wild?
After all, witches residing in Vinexia lead a peaceful and conflict-free life (most of the time, at least). Why not use magic to water plants? Be careful to not get yourself wet in the process!



***
When schedule allows, Helena would drop by the pub for a drink or two.


***
No one seems to know her past.


***
Despite her upbringing in Odsieg, the Land of Art, Patricia can not carry a tune.


***
She looks like she could use a nap all the time.



* Meet vivid characters - what kind of story are you experiencing with them?

Venexia lives in all kinds of people, with distinct personalities and their own lives. What kind of stories will happen when you meet them? What changes will they make with your arrival? This will depend on your actions and choices!

* Explore the magical mainland - what strange dishes have been made this time?

Venexia is a port city, and people from all over the world come here every day. How to satisfy the tastes of different customers? Use a variety of strange ingredients to develop special dishes with their own flavors!

* Develop excellent pub staff - chefs, waiters or handymen?

If you want to open a good pub, you are not enough on your own. there also need all kinds of talents. How to give full play to the advantages of employees and develop their skills? This is a university question!

* Improve partner goodwill - can our relationship be closer?

The Witches Tavern can operate steadily without the support and help of friends. In getting along with each other and communicating, sincere emotions are born. However, is it to maintain friendship or develop more than friendship... love? Make a choice!

* Come and go out for a walk - what will happen today?

It's so boring to stay in the tarven all day! want to chat with my friends, want to go to the store to buy,want to go around the park, but what about the pub? Leave the work to reliable staff and go out to see what’s going on ! Maybe you will meet an accidental event and get a bonus... Maybe you will even see the little-known side of your friends!

* Decorate personalized taverns - how to decorate them better?

I am in charge of my pub! Is it warm or naughty? Is it simple or gorgeous? Change it as you like!

short_description: Witches Tavern is a simulated business game that integrates tavern management, cosplay, love development and other elements. As the new boss of the witches tavern, you will meet all kinds of friends in this magical city of Venesia and start a full and extraordinary life.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
